info.description: This document specifies the APIs that user can implement to consume DigiCert PKI platform web services. It details a set of RESTful APIs to allow issuance, management of certificates and users.
info.title: DigiCert PKI Platform Rest APIs

post.summary: This API is used to enroll a certificate for a given profile.

get.summary: This API is used to get certificate details for a given certificate serial number
This API is used to get private key information for key-escrowed certificate with given serial number

post.summary: This API is used to renew certificate with the given serial number.

put.summary: This API can revoke certificate with the given serial number

delete.summary: This API can resume certificate with the given serial number.

post.summary: This API is used to enroll user for profile.

get.summary: This API is used to get details of an existing enrollment.

put.summary: This API is used to reset enrollment code.

delete.summary: This API can delete an enrollment for given enrollment id

get.summary: This API is used to get certificate enrollment status.
This API is used to get profile details of all profiles in an account and its subaccounts
This API is used to get profile details for a given profile id

post.summary: This API is used to search for certificates.
This API is used to create a seat. This seat can be used for  a user, device, server or organization seat pool.

get.summary: This API is used to get information regarding a seat.

put.summary: This API is used to change the seat details.

delete.summary: This API is used to delete a seat. Deleting a seat will revoke all the certificates associated to the specified seat.

validity.description: Validity of certificate only for enroll certificate API.It is not supported for renewal API
